posts.name: Evan
posts.cooked:
getting a weird error when trying to add a vision measurement to our odometry: “Unhandled exception: java.util.ConcurrentModificationException”

stacktrace leads me to this section of the code:

specifically the addVisionMeasurement method

any help would be greatly appreciated

note: The code runs perfectly for 40-60 seconds, but then unexpectedly crashes.

posts.name: vargoose84

link_counts.title: SwerveDrivePoseEstimator#addVisionMeasurement throws a ConcurrentModificationException · Issue #4952 · wpilibsuite/allwpilib · GitHub

posts.name: Peter Johnson
posts.cooked: It sounds like it’s happening in the same spot, which would point to it being the same issue, even if the exact timing is different.

posts.name: vargoose84
posts.cooked: Ok fair! Does anybody know if there is a workaround of some sort?

posts.name: Joe Ross
posts.cooked: If it is that issue then the limelight latency is >1.5 seconds, so check for that in the same place as aprilTagDetected.

posts.name: vargoose84
posts.cooked: @EvanJ can confirm (I’m not with the team today) but I think we are getting values in the 35ms range not in the 1.5 sec range.

posts.name: Joe Ross
posts.cooked: It doesn’t matter what the normal latency is, it matters what it is at the time the exception is thrown.

posts.name: vargoose84
posts.cooked: Right, sorry for the lack of info, we graphed it in shuffleboard and didn’t notice any spikes that would make it above 1.5 secs, we’ll try this and get back.

posts.name: Sean B
posts.cooked: You can always try getting rid of the latency compensation to verify if that is causing the error.
Were you able to figure out the root cause?  We are having the same exception…

@Peter_Johnson looks like you recently merged in the fix…. Any guesstimate on the next release?

We are just eating the exception for now…

This code throws:  java.util.ConcurrentModificationException (Eventually… once the buffer is full re: Issue above.)

This code works…

I thought a zero for timestamp was saying zero latency, but in fact it is saying that was the position at time zero.  Now I understand the docs better…

posts.name: Peter Johnson
posts.cooked: Should be later today / this evening

posts.name: system
posts.cooked: This topic was automatically closed 365 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
